title: Captain Robert John Long Memorial Scholarship Fund
description: To provide financial support to widows and children of the crew members who perished in the crash of Yukla 27, and to ROTC cadets and midshipmen at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide financial support to widows and children of the crew members who perished in the crash of Yukla 27, and to ROTC cadets and midshipmen at CU Boulder.
